::: The Maximal transwarp scientific research station stood cold and 
abandoned. After Megatron stole the golder disks, along with the plans for 
the transwarp, it really wasnt in use much and eventualy it was shut down. 
Although, one person did inhabit the station. His name was Xavier Minor, but 
his nick name became Syco. The Maximal had a ruff life. His childhood was 
filled with sexual molestation and abuse. I nhis teen years he became violent 
and was in and out of jail. as an adult, he turned into one of Cybertrons 
most villianous criminals, a serial killer and rapist.
Syco couldnt help his urges. Once he saw a female that seemed meek and 
helpless, he struck. After the rape he would beat them until death. That was 
his life, until he escaped onto the space station. For months he hid there, 
trying to figure put what was wrong with him.
Weeks came and went, and finally he decided he wasnt worthy to live in 
socioty. He opened the transwarp tunnle, and went through in a stasis pod...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Syco landed on prehistoric earth quickly. He landed in the middle of a 
protohuman village and the DNA scanners selected his beast mode as, well, a 
human. He stepped out to the simple protohumans who looked at him and awe. 
Syco, with his stronger body, went after the human females of the village. 
Within hours the females were violated, dead, and there children were 
murdered. The men tried to fight Syco, but he killed most of them, the other 
fled into the jungles. :::

::: Days later, he left the holocaust he had caused, once agian filled with 
guilt and remorse. He stumbled onto the Valley that was host to the Neo Beast 
wars...:::

~~~~~~~~~

::: Syco ::: This place is filled with....hatred, Malice, concite...I can 
feel it. This is where i must be stopped. THis is where I am to die.

::: He made his way for hours until he came to the ship that the Allience 
used. He looked it over, and in his protohuman beast mode, went up to the 
ship, and opened fire. :::
